text.content:
"Some fates are not easily avoided."

Also: Avatar, Chosen, Summoner

  • Where do your powers come from? Are they a gift from your bloodline?

  • Have you ever communicated with an Arcanum, or are they silent and distant?

  • Do people see you as mysterious, powerful, or otherworldly?

  • Are there many practicing your art, or are you the exception?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.dqvpb3dkA3cDCChq]{Arcanist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.hEj8s21iAOPhDtJN]{Arcane Circle}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ZTEuKRcX9erp1NDC]{Arcane Regeneration}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.gbkA1CRgQ9OxPstd]{Bind and Summon}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aIbwfdDFTSRgKxxx]{Emergency Arcanum}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Jaxs87P2Q8AfKwWO]{Ritual Arcanism}

ARCANUM RULES

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.sO33zynz6ZsBDpFR]{Arcana Rules}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7Hw8p7ZefudMdCxV]{[Handout: Arcana Rules]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.8ySmNzjYisVduHWP]{[Handout: Arcanum List]}

SAMPLE ARCANUM

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.BhLHFeKBx3zZRZD5]{Arcanum of the Forge}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.TKOESZqheitutkKB]{Arcanum of the Frost}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.UVmSApdqYNDILSFo]{Arcanum of the Gate}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.QbjAsEWA7R2HfFNg]{Arcanum of the Grimoire}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Y3OzDHLCogR32RlH]{Arcanum of the Oak}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.zabsA5F47r9B5h4f]{Arcanum of the Sky}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.n1djlSF3C4c6Hlf4]{Arcanum of the Sword}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.stLDj4YpAoyQFFid]{Arcanum of the Tower}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Dwq6JSEYmSlhpL3b]{Arcanum of the Wheel}

"Power without harmony will only lead to suffering."

Also: Druid, Shapeshifter, Wild Mage

  • Who taught you the art of Chimerism? Is your mentor human or monstrous?

  • Can people and monsters live in harmony, or are they bound to threaten each other?

  • What does your magic look like?

  • Are there many practicing your art, or are you the exception?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.I3qOytLtqR9OAawS]{Chimerist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.c46SCybV1gtiHbL4]{Consume}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.YLWWM3IqnFCAGoUc]{Feral Speech}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EBbeGD1rgPmN6Y6R]{Pathogenesis}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.99bT5ymNnmR60Kmf]{Ritual Chimerism}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.yiX5sLJLKBh3UMmz]{Spell Mimic}

"Today you shall know the full extent of my suffering."

Also: Avenger, Black Knight, Death Knight

  • What tragic experience awakened your abilities?

  • Many would regard your powers as evil. How do you feel about them?

  • What do your weapons and fighting style look like?

  • Are there many practicing your art, or are you the exception?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.AgYLSVuJduaQBja0]{Darkblade}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.JPVEY9p8zsGidKJq]{Agony}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.CEP3nER80UBDH7a9]{Dark Blood}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.e6ids95gOPher40d]{Heart of Darkness}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.YkMaFGnNoWMo6k1U]{Painful Lessons}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.W5hE9L8x7AsJI7a1]{Shadow Strike}

"Ignore the warnings of the World at your own risk."

Also: Battle Mage, Geomancer, Sorcerer

  • Who trained you in the way of the Elements?

  • Your magic can be devastating... are you afraid of yourself?

  • Elemental magic is often used in war. Did you serve in the military?

  • What does your magic look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.vSE3PMoHTGLC1yzG]{Elementalist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.muhtqtJ6av32K34Z]{Cataclysm}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.zlmL0suZwTCQYzE5]{Elemental Magic}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.b5zzfsWN7h5ugrnW]{Magic Artillery}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.qgy43lWGmJ2YGhTp]{Ritual Elementalism}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.v6rTedHMjbLuLdN3]{Spellblade}

SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.GOEbYMBu3cGnszWt]{[Elementalist Spells]}

"The cold between the stars… it does not frighten me."

ALSO: Astromancer, Chaos Mage, Gambler

  • Who taught you to channel the reality-bending powers of the Cosmos?

  • What do you know of the Cosmos? Are they the end of reality, or a new beginning?

  • What does your magic look like?

  • Are there many practicing your art, or are you the exception?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.A24rkaeNHdKThN4N]{Entropist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.jgGLuOvN8xCSQWLK]{Absorb MP}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.vtmxLTltA4JvXFXu]{Entropic Magic}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HgxY0x6jUjS6ppBc]{Lucky Seven}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ko2QCUw6qbxhufwE]{Ritual Entropism}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.84JARbmkQ5r0j39r]{Stolen Time}

SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.W9ZYH88gvlcg7atp]{[Entropist Spells]}

"I'll just have to become stronger than you!"

Also: Berserker, Brawler, Viking

  • Do you rely on your burning passion, or do you strive to keep it under control?

  • There’s that one thing that always makes you lose it. What is it?

  • In the past, your lack of control had tragic consequences. What have you lost?

  • What do your weapons and fighting style look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.JqjAUSTgQyZdfAML]{Fury}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.DniA4VMTBNhk5a1v]{Adrenaline}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.oi2LgAoLN5IyuBG3]{Frenzy}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.wezEekAOYfbxrt74]{Indomitable Spirit}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.XaopYEAay9e86srI]{Provoke}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.OW3xxi09kANGy2ZO]{Withstand}

"Let me be your shield."

Also: Paladin, Soldier, Yōjinbō

  • Who or what is it you would gladly give your life to protect?

  • Are you, or have you ever been, the servant of a Lady or Lord? What were they like?

  • What is it you were unable to protect? What have you lost?

  • What are you using as your armor and/or shield?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.ARBTZXtCwUzlyIyy]{Guardian}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ZvZT5jWlBZVm1Gmd]{Bodyguard}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7wF1oulk0Zn7ITTF]{Defensive Mastery}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPQXTQegswRisA1R]{Dual Shieldbearer}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.X4KdFiQmzikrsM6v]{Fortress}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Z4WIA15aR4uLL5ES]{Protect}

TWIN SHIELDS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.2LyT2btVVPDPYY4h]{Twin Shields}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.G7ia7CUo4fzXL4Lo]{Twin Shields (Runic & Bronze)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.uvNrcaZS9uVW5r7c]{Twin Shields (Runic)}

"Ah, I knew this was going to happen."

Also: Archivist, Sage, Scholar

  • Who is (or was) your mentor? What is (or was) your relationship with them?

  • Did you attend an academy or college? What kind of people did you meet there?

  • There is this centuries-old mystery you’re obsessed with. What is it?

  • Is it true that some things are better left buried beneath the sands of time?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.CCSYiJBV0Ce69JOp]{Loremaster}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.J5KbrSiczxizbdM3]{Flash of Insight}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xaNu6plCZfo9dGsX]{Focused}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.XNAHXFdVPKiABegZ]{Knowledge Is Power}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.YiBD86tGOvFSlaZ6]{Quick Assessment}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.NseNebtgAwSF7pM6]{Trained Memory}

"Words are only as good as the actions that follow."

Also: Ambassador, Diplomat, Entertainer

  • Do you think everyone can be persuaded? Is it true that everyone has a price?

  • You thought someone was on your side, but they betrayed you. Who are they?

  • How do you feel about manipulating people, even if it is for a good cause?

  • In the past, your words ended up putting you in trouble. What happened?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.8HxmAoTTwLlmQ8Fc]{Orator}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.DtEiCkDsC1amYABn]{Condemn}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.04DiGVKhF3DtmJ4n]{Encourage}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.lK9onKSiMuQEe3zd]{My Trust In You}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.GjmqoWAJ4szsk0om]{Persuasive}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ucCrtRAvv2qX8aJO]{Unexpected Ally}

"I will find my own justice."

Also: Bandit, Ninja, Thief

  • What drives you? Is it desire, vengeance, or a burning need for freedom?

  • Are you part of a criminal gang or guild, or do you work on your own?

  • Is there a place you can call home? Or is it true that, in the end, we all die alone?

  • What is the most important rule in your personal code?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.q7ak4N89Makw4jiJ]{Rogue}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.c2XRt5pvOab25Tbe]{Cheap Shot}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ksgKc90MZSpDTka7]{Dodge}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.tiu0D74YNxirN6Tr]{High Speed}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.cHKzZJBYjwLuRfDL]{See You Later}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.bpCv5Vkr1aWZiFSw]{Soul Steal}

"Flee to the other end of the world; my arrow shall find you."

Also: Archer, Gunslinger, Sniper

  • Some believe arrows and bullets to be a coward's weapons. What's your opinion?

  • When caught unprepared, do you improvise or do you retreat?

  • Are you quiet and reserved, confident and cunning, or boisterous and reckless?

  • What do your weapons and fighting style look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.eO37Jm8x3VaGmE7c]{Sharpshooter}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.lCFQMCY4AmDsv6sv]{Barrage}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.sIkQa2NzkqsvczBr]{Crossfire}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.hmDCgX5OEk5l4uXW]{Hawkeye}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0UxTgrag7cE4M1oc]{Ranged Weapon Mastery}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ovmw7cMrN6qvagG4]{Warning Shot}

"Show me the truths of your heart."

Also: Healer, Priest, Witch

  • Where does your magic come from? What are your beliefs concerning life and death?

  • How do you feel about manipulating other people’s emotions and vital energy?

  • What do you think of religion? Are you part of a specific cult, church or institution?

  • What does your magic look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.s7AtJlv04lTsbKg4]{Spiritist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.rVM7HhQ5OwdPtFwa]{Healing Power}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ek0pzfo1bSWGHfzb]{Ritual Spiritism}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.dwVQpxDTOZeNbcjy]{Spiritual Magic}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.pIkEDFcA5pnIpsu3]{Support Magic}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.affUHtuCYoDxmO4h]{Vismagus}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.fIzsuP7ro97Xc8H0]{[Spiritist Spells]}

"I like to think that what we have today is not a gift from the Gods."

Also: Alchemist, Magitech Engineer, Mechanic

  • Did you learn your craft from someone? What is your relationship with them?

  • What have you lost in the pursuit of progress and innovation?

  • Is your craft something revolutionary, or is it an established field of work?

  • When an item or effect is created through your abilities, what does it look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.Zmqvu8QKmgyIci7C]{Tinkerer}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.2MoV74xWJnF5Ru8u]{Emergency Item}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0ErPA4Q0P97ZPwPE]{Gadgets}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xzyAHegWwSaysYqV]{Potion Rain}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.S64zqBVdaYA3I5LW]{Secret Formula}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.6pJAB6E29I15q1gU]{Visionary}

GADGETS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Gadget - Alchemy}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Gadget - Infusion}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Gadget- Magitech}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPfawWXZqKuHAAqj]{Magitech Override}

"Borders are a trick of the mind."

Also: Adventurer, Explorer, Treasure Hunter

  • What led you to live a life of endless travels? Was it your choice? ...are you tired?

  • Is there a place or person that feels like “home” to you?

  • You have met many people and visited many places. Is there one you can’t forget?

  • You lost something or someone because of your travels. What happened?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.EWKUOGOMmyHfgOJm]{Wayfarer}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.L34pOGhdH0ZwV4Bt]{Faithful Companion}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0n8T7U81oNP7yU5X]{Resourceful}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.CHMsojkTh3fU8HXg]{Tavern Talk}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.rsGhkElIiEBgN5zA]{Treasure Hunter}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.fuPzuDHzaKUgbvL2]{Well-Traveled}

"The wiser blade remains unsheathed."

Also: Fighter, Ronin, Warrior

  • What is your relationship with weapons? Are they mere objects, or something more?

  • Is battle something you seek, or something you strive to avoid?

  • Are you, or have you ever been, the servant of a Lady or Lord? What were they like?

  • What do your weapons and fighting style look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.kVSzbabb2AUviwnH]{Weaponmaster}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.IhBCZsilt0bj5RJK]{Bladestorm}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7jWycVYFgZ1BMxch]{Bone Crusher}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.WZDdQfw9VF64La2P]{Breach}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.XhcTVGtGEk7L2Ddq]{Counterattack}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ztxLYzo1ADCaRupR]{Melee Weapon Mastery}

"Show’s just begun, and it’s lights out for you already!"

ALSO: Bard, Idol, Troubadour

  • Who taught you how to combine magic and music? Is it a natural talent?

  • Are you a celebrity, or more of a traveling musician?

  • Who is your greatest music rival? Who inspires you to be who you are?

  • What do your instruments and singing style look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.hgYU8yjiz01xB6Zj]{Chanter}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.bt4jQZ557iLHlazO]{Magichant}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kdL9oQYefqNlWqyD]{Resonance}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.huB2uoP2PAHoOp8T]{Siren's Song}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.9xjUyytWiDxFhqdV]{Sound Barrier}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.pQVuklFnMKXxHTFr]{Vibrato}

VERSES

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.q4PpsRwoiMTRKUeJ]{Verses Rules}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.c8jU0AIm1nOBRQaX]{[Handout: Key List]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.dzv1DzQ6N3FKATek]{[Handout: Tone List]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.8d9spHVFrK4kyLsd]{[Handout: Verses Rules]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.nu7QnUu7tmVv6zxU]{Verse}

"War has no victors."

ALSO: Prince, Queen, Shōgun

  • Are you of noble birth? Or perhaps a hero of humble beginnings?

  • Is battle something you seek, or something you strive to avoid?

  • Are there any sacrifices you would never be willing to make to achieve victory?

  • How do you manifest your abilities? Are they visibly supernatural?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.2ZBMQzwMLEGVJkz2]{Commander}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.FGihIPfif7yWsBCp]{Bishop's Edict}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.VhWG5AXdBZ8hL4xr]{Charging Cavalry}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.4ymBr3vRdPHNxIKC]{Crushing Chariot}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.79xGJD8jn4zGzYpX]{King's Castle}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HC27DMHBE4M54y6Y]{Queen's Gambit}

"My story? Dance with me and you shall know it."

ALSO: Acrobat, Jester, Swashbuckler

  • Your abilities require great focus and discipline. Who was your teacher?

  • Why do you dance? Is it an art form, a profession, or something else?

  • Are you graceful and charming, or roguish and boisterous?

  • What do your stunts and performances look like?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.KoQ2Q4mPVC7cpts7]{Dancer}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.y0dACFzoQBBMZOEk]{Dance}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.3mqtdzwMU62J1ogW]{Follow My Lead}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.R0F1K6i1gjNWNklq]{Frenetic Footwork}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.DF1eCfsBw1kYOAH6]{Quick-Change}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.L4LqyZu7NPjavyaf]{Wardancer}

DANCES

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.cH2N0pg4NeNZpaM5]{Dances Rules}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kTJhhmUgvlOMSgKh]{[Handout: Dance List]}

"What good is a brush if your heart is not in the right place?"

ALSO: Calligrapher, Painter, Runemaker

  • Who or what taught you how to weave magic into symbols?

  • Do you consider yourself more of a spellcaster or an artist?

  • Are there many practicing your art, or are you the exception?

  • What do your symbols look like, and how do you place them on creatures?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.m2nmisQnnkVKowT7]{Symbolist}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ffgsQbg3SuWBUUS2]{Magic Symbols}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.mqwu1cSVPhWdT2Mt]{Mirage}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.nAX4AsRoQhmO6gnf]{Personal Touch}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.h6ynrwX1sUsBQYAE]{Symbolic Connection}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Twj3wpoMzSpUE3Go]{Symbolism}

SYMBOLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.t38IeNrS9T7NQspT]{Symbol Rules}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.E0m9ZsyQ5HG8k77Y]{[Handout: Symbol Rules]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.v1HYJJsqOzPWrYv8]{[Handout: Symbol List]}

"Don't look away."

Also: Deckmancer, Destiny Duelist, High Roller

  • When did you first manifest your magic powers?

  • Are you cold and perceptive, or brash and lively? What does your deck look like?

  • What was the most unfortunate event in your life? What did you learn from it?

  • How do you combine your deck with other abilities?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.R6Wcc6Gcf27yWalj]{Ace of Cards}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.sfIxI8t0XlJMMVFC]{Double or Nothing}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.tFbGtEfIudpck8vL]{High or Low}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.5zF6JTf6nhKbXr69]{Magic Cards}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ry0CUZsygSpySLBZ]{Mulligan}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.dHurcgjvmwVBJPvM]{Trap Card}

THE DECK

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.FVmAbnxp6kZyoqkN]{[Handout: Deck]}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.z3xhzflevgPyf7ah]{[Handout: Managing The Deck]}

"Waste not, want not."

Also: Grave Queen, Reanimator, Vampire

  • Who taught you in the ways of necromancy? Are they living or (un)dead?

  • Your powers act against the natural soul cycle. How do you feel about this?

  • Are you cold and grim, or decadent and sardonic?

  • Who have you lost? Who would you resurrect, given the power to do so?

BASE CLASS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.Item.hAaL90nfamx7FfrY]{Necromancer}

SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.QwAuh7RXGBQsCb6l]{Beyond The Realms Of Death}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kOEljjCw7bS9FyJv]{Children Of The Grave}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.4TxnpOUnaOaTFCP0]{Fear Is The Key}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.oevRD7ES46HQEOKn]{For Whom The Bell Tolls}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.VSWCJDqDERswimf0]{Rondo Of Nightmare}

"Within this steel beat the hearts and hopes of all of Minerva IV. The Empire has already lost, they just don’t know it yet."

Also: Biker, Mech Pilot, Sky Pirate

  • Where did you learn to pilot? Is your teacher still alive?

  • How did you obtain your vehicle? Did you build it yourself? Did you inherit it?

  • What personal touch makes your vehicle stand out from the rest?

  • Who or what would you never allow aboard your vehicle?
